titleStmt.title: Elija the Tishbite's supplication when presented the likeness of hand, &c. (Kings 18.)
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p.8: Eleanor Tichet [i.e. Lady Eleanor].
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Lady Elnor Davies"; "Nouemb: 22".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
